If I had to kill myself? And some of you are calling my a sadistic careless 
bastard? I wouldnt use pills. A misjudgement in dosage could result in severe 
stomach cramps and an embarrassing trip to the hospital to get your stomach 
pumped. 

--part1_c7.695614c.27ac7561_boundary
